item.title: How to integrate umami to your website for free
item.description:
This article is about how to integrate umami website analytics to your website for free. The database use postgres with 500M storage limit provided by supabase.

The umami service is hosted with vercel. Thanks to the excellent service capabilities of cloud vendors, you can integrate umami in less than 10 minutes. You can see the umami dashboard by clicking the Dashboard.

item.title: How to create your blog by hugo ladder in 30min
item.description: This article is the second in a series on how to create you blog by hugo ladder for free, including using the hugo ladder configuration and integrate comments and analytics features, etc.

item.title: How to create your blog for free in 10min
item.description:
This article is the first in a series on how to build a free independent blog, and will also teach you how to quickly use the features of GitHub Pages to build your blog.

It will help you build and deploy a blog site quickly. For more on hugo-ladder, we recommend following this article to build how to create your blog for free by hugo ladder theme in 30minã€‚
